components.description: A small version of the large orange diamond emoji.
components.title: Small Orange Diamond

description: A small version of the large orange diamond emoji.
title: Small Orange Diamond

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Geometric shapes
emoji_net_data.definition: A small version of the large orange diamond emoji. Small Orange Diamond was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 and added to Emoji 1.0 i http://emojipedia.org/small-orange-diamond/
emoji_net_data.name: small orange diamond

apple_vendor_description: The small orange diamond emoji on Apple devices shimmers with a vibrant, sun-kissed hue, showcasing Apple's characteristic soft gradients and polished finish.  Its perfectly faceted form catches light from multiple angles, giving it a delightful 3D presence and a feeling of preciousness.  This gem-like icon, rendered with Apple's meticulous attention to detail, is often used to represent something valuable, a bright idea, or a small but significant positive element in digital conversations.
